document.full_text: accused hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam did not get secrets about advanced micro devices inc and ebay inc from a former high-placed friend because the information was already public, his lawyer argued at trial on wednesday.
document.title: rajaratnam lawyer: information public, not secret
lines_and_colors: accused hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam did not get secrets about advanced micro devices inc and ebay inc from a former high-placed friend because the information was already public, his lawyer argued at trial on wednesday.
